purple.description: Sequential scale from light to dark purple, derived from violet tokens
purple.accessibility: WCAG AA compliant on white background from index 4 onwards

neutral.description: Sequential scale from light to dark grey

purpleToGrey.description: Diverging scale for showing deviation from center

primary.description: Categorical palette for distinct categories, max 6 recommended
primary.usage: Use purple as primary/highlight, greys for supporting categories

spotColor.description: Use to highlight key insights in charts

rules.label_first: Prefer mark labels over axis labels
rules.spot_color: Use spot color to emphasize key data points or insights
rules.no_pie_gauge: Never use pie charts or gauge charts
rules.collision_avoidance: Ensure labels never overlap with data marks

meta.generation_method: Computed from core Kearney tokens using mathematical interpolation
